# GET /v1/appClips/{id}/relationships/appClipAdvancedExperiences | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/appClips/{id}/relationships/appClipAdvancedExperiences 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appClips/{id}/relationships/appClipAdvancedExperiences

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClips-_id_-relationships-appClipAdvancedExperiences#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appClips/{id}/relationships/appClipAdvancedExperiences
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClips-_id_-relationships-appClipAdvancedExperiences#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClips-_id_-relationships-appClipAdvancedExperiences#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClips-_id_-relationships-appClipAdvancedExperiences#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppClipAppClipAdvancedExperiencesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appclipappclipadvancedexperienceslinkagesresponse)`OK`
